arcade.util

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.util.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for dense and sparse matrix representations.

    Class provides a subset of matrix operations needed for solving a system of linear equations using the successive over-relaxation method in Solver.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Container class for sparse matrix representation.

      • forwardSubstitution

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Matrix.Value> forwardSubstitution(java.util.ArrayList<Matrix.Value> A)
        Solves the equation Lx = U using forward substitution for a sparse matrix.

        The matrices L and U are the square lower and upper triangular matrices of the given matrix.

        Parameters:
        A - the matrix of coefficients
        Returns:
        the left-hand side matrix

      • forwardSubstitution

                                           double[] b)
        Solves the equation Lx = b using forward substitution for a sparse matrix.
        Parameters:
        L - the matrix of coefficients
        b - the right-hand side vector
        Returns:
        the left-hand side vector

      • forwardSubstitution

        public static double[][] forwardSubstitution(double[][] A)

        the left-hand side matrix

      • forwardSubstitution

        public static double[] forwardSubstitution(double[][] L,
                                           double[] b)
        Solves the equation Lx = b using forward substitution for a dense matrix.

        Matrix L must be a square lower triangular matrix.

        Parameters:
        L - the matrix of coefficients
        b - the right-hand side vector
        Returns:
        the left-hand side vector
